TopicTitle: Keyboard keys to use when using Control From Here?

Articles.Content: I'm curious to know if somebody has already thought of this. I'd like a mod that will, on screen tell me which keys to press to go up, down, left, right, etc. to move a spacecraft around properly after selecting "Control From Here" on a docking port. Because relearning the controls each time I select an arbitrary docking port is driving me batsh** insane. If none exists, I'm fooking well gonna write it.
